title: Ideally, How Tall Would Nick Scarpino Be? - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 179)
description:
Go to http://www.stamps.com and use promo code KINDAFUNNY to get a 4-week trial plus free postage and a digital scale.

SnowBikeMike joins us to discuss how tall we all wish we were, what we would make super big if we could, and words we don't like.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:15 - Nicknames with Scarpino
00:08:15 - Top ten worst words
00:21:04 - Design merch
00:29:15 - Best KF teacher
00:41:10 - Nick wants to be taller
00:56:05 -  pym particle your world

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
